title: E-VOA Kios-k
description: E-VOA is an alternative to visas issued electronically via e-VISA Application, visa on arrival at the port of entry, and visa at Indonesian Embassy/Consulate.
short_description: The application will be implemented at the airport Kiosk-K so that users can extend their visas independently.

goals.description: Revamp e-Voa design (from website https://molina.imigrasi.go.id/) so that it can responsive in kiosk which can be placed at the airport.
